tomconn.growthapi.base

Interface IEventHandler<E extends net.minecraftforge.fml.common.eventhandler.Event,X extends ICompositeEventProcessor<E,? extends IEventPackage<E>>>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - the event handled by this handler
    X - the processor used in this handler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultCropGrowthPreEventHandler
